column1: Bisauli is a town and a municipal board in Badaun district  in the state of Uttar Pradesh
column2: India. It is settled on Badaun - Moradabad Highway. Bisauli is known for its temples and mosques abounding the town.

column6: lower than the state average of 67.68%; male literacy was 69.17% and female literacy was 56.65%. 14.08% of the population was under 6 years of age.
